thread.title: Swipe Konnect Star with 4-inch display, VoLTE and 16GB storage launched for Rs 3,799
thread.title_full: Swipe Konnect Star with 4-inch display, VoLTE and 16GB storage launched for Rs 3,799

title: Swipe Konnect Star with 4-inch display, VoLTE and 16GB storage launched for Rs 3,799
text:
Swipe Konnect Star with 4-inch display, VoLTE and 16GB storage launched for... Swipe Konnect Star with 4-inch display, VoLTE and 16GB storage launched for Rs 3,799 By - February 15, 2017 “The Konnect Star is an entry-level 4G smartphone with 1GB of RAM, a quad-core SoC and a 5MP rear camera” 
Last month Swipe launched the budget VoLTE-enabled Elite Power and the entry-level Konnect Grand . Today, the company has added a new entry-level 4G and VoLTE-enabled smartphone called the Konnect Star to its portfolio. The dual-SIM smartphone runs Android 6.0 Marshmallow and comes with support for 12 regional languages. 
The Swipe Konnect Star features a compact 4-inch display, and is powered by a 1GHz quad-core processor, mated to 1GB of RAM and 16GB of storage. The phone comes with a 5-megapixel rear snapper, accompanied by an LED flash, and a 1.3-megapixel selfie shooter. In terms of connectivity, the VoLTE-enabled device offers Wi-Fi, FM Radio, Bluetooth and GPS. 
The Swipe Konnect Star has been priced at Rs 3,799, and is being offered in silver, golden and grey hues. The phone will be available exclusively on Snapdeal starting tomorrow. As part of the launch offer, the e-tailer is offering Rs 200 off to the first 500 customers who register for the phone. Facebook Comments
